Summary: Flashing starlike object in the sky
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my boyfriend we are outside in the house looking the star because the earth hour, in the time like 8:55 pm, in the north we saw a blinking star, to strong color blue pale like other star, and bright like Venus, they blink 3 times, but each blink time was 12 or 15 seconds, low for airplane, or slow and to bright for satellite, and only one color blink no more colors. In the same place, a place with no other star a black space, we have android google sky and no famous star there.and disapear in the 3rd blink. What is that?
trends: There have been no other sightings in Guayama
This sighting has never been favorited.
